Why was the name given Electrohomeopathy?

The name Electro Homoeopathy comes from the Electro content extracted from the plants, and the way this energy is extracted and made into the remedies. Electro Homoeopathy is a name given by the founder, on the basis that those remedies are class of energy conforming to the law of similar and they possess a power and promptness and speed of action of the remedy which allows them to be compared to electricity. Electro is not related to the electricity current and not using any type of electric machine in the treatments. The word Electrohomeopathy is a combination of three words are (1) Electro, (2) Homeo and (3) Pathy.

Electro: means the Bio-Energy contents extracted from plants which work in the specific manner maintaining the function of organs. 
It corrects the disorder and results in restoration of the electrical energy level of the cellular system as per low of polarity of the human body.
 Homeo: means the equilibrium or balance of energy.
 It works towards homeostasis which is the physical and chemical consistency of the cell. This ensures the accuracy among all the cells so that the body functions at an equilibrium state
 Pathy: means system of medicine

i.e. a system of treatment in which biological energy extracts of plants are use for treatment. This extract received by the process named Cohobation Method in which the living energies of the plants in the form of essences obtained from medicinal plants. Each remedy is made of biological energy of several plants so Electropathy / Electrohomeopathy remedies are complex remedies there for some called it COMPLEXA-COMPLEXIS-CURANTURE.
